Constructor for initializing an InvalidRequestError.

<Note>
  `InvalidRequestError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all
  supported methods.

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidRequestError } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### message

`string`

- Optional error message. Defaults to "Invalid request" if not provided.
